Name: Breda

Name: Breda

Name: Breda
Review Text: Beautiful restaurant with incredible food. Great presentation and flavor. Only wish was that there were more courses.

Name: Breda

Name: Breda

Name: Breda
Review Text: We had the five course lunch menu and were very impressed. They didn't offer a wine pairing as such but did give us by the glass recommendations for every course. The food was tasty and beautifully presented. The best food we had in Amsterdam.

Name: Breda
Review Text: My wife and I had a nice lunch here. They offer 3, 4, 5 course meal on their lunch menu. We ordered the 5 course one and it was just right for our appetit. Name: Breda
Review Text: Really Good and interesting courses and wines.

Name: Breda
